name: First Steps into Gaming - First Person Shooter
name_original: First Steps into Gaming - First Person Shooter
description:
Do you want to show a friend or a family member your favorite games? But they never played a single video game in their life? Show them "First Steps into Gaming"!

This game introduces new players to movement and interactions in the virtual world by teaching them how to look around, walk, jump, sprint, crouch, strafe, interact and shoot in a friendly and non-threatening environment. The experience has no time limit and guides the player with button prompts supporting both keyboard and mouse as well as controller for PC.

It is a short educational experience to teach first time gamers the basics of first person shooters step by step.

Available languages: 

  • English
  • German
